title: Estimated U.S. retail per capita sales from 2000 to 2017
yAxis: Per capita sales in U.S. dollars
summary: Overall Per capita sales in U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Per capita sales in U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2012 to 2014, roughly constant from 2014 to 2015, and finally slightly increasing from 2015 to 2017.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2016 and 2017.
The highest Per capita sales in U.S. dollars, of value 15522.0 was reached at Year 2017
Minimum Per capita sales in U.S. dollars about 13702.0 was reached at Year 2012
